verbs.description: [ARG0: red sox] win game 5 5 - 1 [V: take] [ARG1: home fourth world series title] [ARGM-TMP: in 15 years] the boston red sox won their fourth world series championship in 15 years beating the los angeles dodgers 5 - 1 in game 5 sunday night behind david price pitching and steve pearce power david price david price british politician pubfile 10tv com los angeles dodgers alex cora boston red sox steve pearce 15 years fcc becky richey puerto rico red sox world series
